content:
Start of Editing Requirements

  • Source Retrieval. The source of any given entity should be retrievable via HTTP.

  • Notification of Intention to Edit. It should be possible to notify the HTTP server that an entity is about to be edited by a given person. It should be possible to query the HTTP server for the list of people who have notified the server of their intent to edit an entity.
